Description: The racial discrimination award, which was dismissed by the trial judge but reinstated by the court of appeals, included $450,000 from Illinois Power for the two plaintiffs plus $109,000 in legal fees.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Description: Ameren agreed to pay $175.750 million in settlement of its alleged actions and negligence relating to the Taum Sauk reservoir collapse that damaged a state park and other natural resources.
Ameren/CIPS agreed to pay $50,000 in settlement of allegations CIPS exceeded environmental limits of discharges from its ash-holding ponds into the Wabash River from its Hutsonville power plant.

AmerenUE agreed to pay $1.3 million to the Conservation Commission Fund and the Natural Resources Protection Fund in settlement of allegations it killed approximatedly 43,000 fish in the Lake of the Ozarks when they were sucked into a dam' turbine generators.  Many of the fish had been stocked there by the Missouri Department of Conservation. The company also agreed to pay $2.1 million to the Missouri Division of State Parks and Historic Sites.

Company: Illinois Power Co. and Dynergy Midwest Generation
Description: Illinois Power Company and its successor Dynegy Midwest Generation agreed to pay $24 million -- consisting of a $9 million civil penalty and $15 million in spending on projects to mitigate harm caused by unlawful emissions -- to Illinois and the federal government in settlement of Clean Air Act violations at five Illinois power plants. The case was also reported by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-illinois-power-company

Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on October 15, 2020 in response to an open records request. The data is a spreadsheet version of the entries contained in the search engine at http://www.epa.state.il.us/cgi-bin/en/orders/orders.pl
